text: Kon'na (jotai no tokoro) ni, ware wa kare-ra o (nemuri kara) Satoru shite, tagaini towa saseta. Hitori ga itta. `Anata gata wa (koko ni) dore-i taizai shita nodesu ka.' Suru to kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa tsuitachi ka, tsuitachi-tarazu no taizaidesu.' To (kotaete) itta. (Shibaraku shite mata) itta. `Arra wa anata gataga tairyu shita koto o mottomo yoku shitte ora remasu. Sa, kono zeni o motte hitori o machi ni yari, sokode mottomo kiyoi tabemono o motte iru mono o mitsukete, soko kara shokuryo o anata gata ni motte kitasa seyou. Kare ni wa shincho ni furumawa sete, anata gata no koto o darenimo kidzuka sete wa naranai
